messages.subject: Video game creation software
messages.msgSnippet: WE found darkBASIC online. ARe there any programs that are FREE that we can use, or are they all something we have to purchase? Just curious before we start
messages.messageBody:
WE found darkBASIC online.
ARe there any programs that are FREE that we can use, or are they all something we have to purchase?

Just curious before we start buying.

Kristen


****************************************************************

Today is even more important than tomorrow because "today" is a gift, and "tomorrow" might never come.

Today is where hope lives because today is when we can make things better than yesterday.

The only thing we can be sure of is today and life isn't worth living if it isn't lived in joy for as many moments of today as we can manage.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
